secret_rule: Only items that are used in a typical school classroom can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "pencil" and "notebook".

Okay, let me think about this...

Based on the examples provided, "pencil" and "notebook", it seems like the rule may be related to school supplies or stationery items.

To make a new guess that hasn't been mentioned before, I'll suggest: "highlighter".

A highlighter is a common school supply, like a pencil and notebook, so it seems like it could fit the rule.
Yes, you can bring a highlighter.

Okay, based on the examples provided so far - "pencil", "notebook", and "highlighter" - it seems the rule may be related to common stationery or school supplies.

In that case, I'll make a new guess that hasn't been mentioned yet:

"Ruler"

A ruler is another typical school supply, like the previous examples, so I believe it would also fit the rule.
Yes, you can bring a ruler.

Okay, based on the examples provided - "pencil", "notebook", "highlighter", and "ruler" - it seems the rule is related to common office/school supplies or stationery items.

My final guess for the rule is:

The rule is that you can bring any typical office or school supply item.

This includes things like pens, pencils, notebooks, highlighters, rulers, staplers, paper clips, erasers, and other common stationery or desk accessories.

The game master has confirmed that "pencil", "notebook", "highlighter", and "ruler" are all acceptable, which aligns with my understanding of the rule being focused on standard office/school supplies.

So I believe my final guess of the rule being related to bringing typical stationery and school supply items is accurate.
Correct! The rule is: Only items that are used in a typical school classroom can be brought to the picnic.
